column4: This may seem like a question i've answered if i'm in here, but what IRC client do you recommend for Ubuntu?  Not liking Xchat.

That being said, I've noticed when I upgrade ubuntu it started having weird issues. Kind of sick of the new ubuntu layout anyway, may switch to mint. Probably not the place to be bragging about that. :>
hehe, i'm seeing how long i can go before i add the 700+ mb to use KDE programs.  Now's probably the time to just do it  :-)
